body: With a simple hit, you more easily intimidate an opponent.
name: Bullying Blow
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Orcs/New Racial Rules/Orc Feats/Bullying Blow

sections.body: As a standard action, you may make a melee attack with a –2 penalty on the attack roll. If the attack damages your opponent, you may make an Intimidate check to demoralize that opponent as a free action.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: Intimidating an opponent is a standard action.
sections.name: Normal
